title: Understanding Blood Sugar: A Complete Guide for Type 1 Diabetics
snippet: Learn everything about blood sugar management for Type 1 diabetes. Understand glucose levels, what affects them, and how to maintain optimal control.

title: Insulin 101: Types, Timing, and How to Optimize Your Doses
snippet: Complete guide to insulin types for Type 1 diabetes. Learn about rapid-acting vs long-acting insulin, optimal timing, and tips for better glucose control.

title: How Food Affects Your Blood Sugar: The Glycemic Index Explained
snippet: Master the glycemic index and glycemic load to make smarter food choices and achieve better blood sugar control with Type 1 diabetes.

title: Exercise and Blood Sugar: What Every Diabetic Should Know
snippet: Learn how exercise affects blood sugar in Type 1 diabetes. Discover strategies for pre and post-workout glucose management and preventing lows.

title: CGM vs Finger Sticks: Which Glucose Monitoring is Right for You?
snippet: Compare continuous glucose monitors (Dexcom, Libre) with traditional finger stick testing. Learn the pros, cons, accuracy, and costs.
